verses.verse: I waited <WH6960> patiently <WH6960> for the Lord <WH3068>; and he inclined <WH5186> unto me <WH8085>, and heard my cry <WH7775>.

He brought me up <WH5927> also out of a horrible <WH7588> pit <WH953>, out of the miry <WH3121> clay <WH2916>, and set <WH6965> my feet <WH7272> upon a rock <WH5553>, and established <WH3559> my goings <WH838>.

And he has put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892> in my mouth <WH6310>, even praise <WH8416> unto our God <WH430>: many <WH7227> shall see <WH7200> it <WH3372>, and fear, and shall trust <WH982> in the Lord <WH3068>.
Blessed <WH835> is that man <WH1397> that makes <WH7760> the Lord <WH3068> his trust <WH4009>, and respects <WH6437> not the proud <WH7295>, nor such as turn aside <WH7750> to lies <WH3577>.

Many <WH7227>, O Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430>, are your wonderful <WH6381> works which you have done <WH6213>, and your thoughts <WH4284> which are to us-ward <WH6186>: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto you <WH5046>: if I would declare and speak <WH1696> of them <WH6105>, they are more than can be numbered <WH5608>.
Sacrifice <WH2077> and offering <WH4503> you did not desire <WH2654>; my ears <WH241> have you opened <WH3738>: burnt offering <WH5930> and sin offering <WH2401> have you not required <WH7592>.
Then said <WH559> I <WH935>, Behold, I come: in the volume <WH4039> of the book <WH5612> it is written of me <WH3789>,
I delight <WH2654> to do <WH6213> your will <WH7522>, O my God <WH430>: Yes <WH8451>, your law is inside <WH8432> my heart <WH4578>.
I have preached <WH1319> righteousness <WH6664> in the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>: behold <WH3607>, I have not refrained my lips <WH8193>, O Lord <WH3068>, you know <WH3045>.

I have not hid <WH3680> your righteousness <WH6666> inside <WH8432> my heart <WH3820>; I have declared <WH559> your faithfulness <WH530> and your salvation <WH8668>: I have not concealed <WH3582> your lovingkindness <WH2617> and your truth <WH571> from the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>.
Withhold <WH3607> not you your tender mercies <WH7356> from me <WH3068>, O Lord: let your lovingkindness <WH2617> and your truth <WH571> continually <WH8548> preserve me <WH5341>.

For innumerable <WH4557> evils <WH7451> have surrounded <WH661> me about <WH5771>: my iniquities have taken hold <WH5381> upon me <WH3201>, so that I am not able to look up <WH7200>; they are more <WH6105> than the hairs <WH8185> of my head <WH7218>: therefore my heart <WH3820> fails me <WH5800>.
Be pleased <WH7521>, O Lord <WH3068>, to deliver <WH5337> me <WH3068>: O Lord, make haste <WH2363> to help me <WH5833>.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH2659> together <WH3162> that seek <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315> to destroy <WH5595> it <WH5472>; let them be driven backward <WH268> and put to shame <WH3637> that wish <WH2655> me evil <WH7451>.
Let them be desolate <WH8074> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say <WH559> unto me <WH1889>, Aha, aha <WH1889>.

Let all those that seek <WH1245> you rejoice <WH7797> and be glad <WH8055> in you <WH157>: let such as love your salvation <WH8668> say <WH559> continually <WH8548>, The Lord <WH3068> be magnified <WH1431>.
But I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>; yet the Lord <WH136> thinks <WH2803> upon me <WH5833>: you are my help and my deliverer <WH6403>; make no delay <WH309>, O my God <WH430>.
